# Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) â€“ Domain Overview

## Scope
The FP&A domain governs financial planning, budgeting, forecasting,
variance analysis, and management reporting.

This domain supports strategic and operational decision-making
through forward-looking financial insight.

## Characteristics
- Forward-looking and analytical
- Scenario-driven and assumption-based
- Strong governance and reproducibility requirements
- Clear separation from transactional execution

## Domain Authority
This domain is authoritative for:
- Budgets and forecasts
- Financial scenarios and projections
- Variance analysis and performance insights
- Management financial views

Other domains may supply historical data
but must not redefine planning assumptions or outcomes.
